resources.string: The notification service is currently enabled
Applications to monitor for missed notifications
The following permissions are required for the app work: \"%1$s\". Please allow them.

The application is already excluded from battery optimization

Some devices may have additional battery usage limitation settings. If you experience issues with the app please check https://dontkillmyapp.com website for possible solution
The Android OS optimizes battery usage for the application. If you experience problems with the reminder work please disable battery optimization for the "Missed Notification Reminder" application
Foreground service disabled. Adjust if you experience issues with app stable work
Foreground service is enabled. Use this only if you experience issues with the reminder work. This will keep device ON all the time while reminder interval is scheduled
Reminder will repeat limited number of times
Create extra notification when reminders are active to allow stopping them without dismissing notification(s) from other apps
Create extra notification when the first reminder event occurs
Create extra notification immediately after any monitored app have posted notification
Keep device awake (WARNING, use this only if you experience issues with the reminder work. This will keep device ON all the time while reminder interval is scheduled)

Pattern must be specified as a list of integers separated by commas. The first value indicates the number of milliseconds to wait before turning the vibrator on. The next value indicates the number of milliseconds for which to keep the vibrator on before turning it off. Subsequent values alternate between durations in milliseconds to turn the vibrator off or to turn the vibrator on. Example: 0, 100, 50, 100, 200
Do not remind while screen is turned on
Remind while screen is turned on
Remind while phone call is active
Do not remind while phone call is active
Ignore device audio profile (Keep remind in silent mode)
Check device audio profile (Do not remind in silent mode)
An error occurred loading the application data.\nPlease try again later.
There doesn\'t seem to be\nany applications available.
Dismiss this notification to stop reminders.
